document_data.name: Thessalgorgon
document_data.mainbody: '''Thessalgorgons''' were one of the four known [[thessalmonster]]s, a species of crossbred hybrid creatures. A thessalgorgon was the result of crossbreeding a [[thessalhydra]] and a [[gorgon]].
document_data.Description: A thessalgorgon had a large, reptilian body covered in strong scales. It had a long tail that ended in a pair of large, sharp pincers. Its head was that of a bull, surrounded by a ring of eight [[hydra]]-like heads. The upper half of its body was covered in hair.
document_data.Abilities: Thessalgorgons had a natural immunity to all known acids, as well as petrification effects and spells. It had a devastating breath weapon: a cloud of petrifying gas up to {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} in length. If one of its heads was severed, it grew back over a twelve-day period.
document_data.Combat: Each of the serpentine heads acted independently and injected a poison with each bite.

Ecology.Habitats: Some thessalgorgons were known to be found in the land of [[Chult]].
Ecology.Usage: Juvenile thessalgorgons were sometimes used as guards. Thessalgorgon eggs were worth up to 7,000 [[gp]] and a live juvenile up to 10,000 gp.
